description:
This course will help you redesign your job hunting strategies and career path. You'll make better progress towards the job, career, and income you want. The lessons represent over a decade's worth of research and first-hand experience with our challenging job market.

In less than two hours, you can learn how to...

  • Impress potential employers during interviews and get them to offer you a job.
  • Build a network of professional relationships that will help you get a better career.
  • Avoid a lot of the frustration and discouragement others experience when looking for a new job.
  • Learn some secrets corporate recruiters have shared about what it takes to get a job offer.
  • Effectively prove that you're qualified for the job.


Over 3,000 students have already enrolled and are learning how to get a better job and income more quickly!

REVIEWS FOR THIS COURSE:

Read what some people have said about this course:

  • Dr. Roger Allen, an Author, Consultant, and Executive Coach said: "I loved your course! You've condensed tons of practical content into an extremely usable guide for anyone who wants to either find a job or improve their skills and value on the job."
  • Shannon Aragon recently got a great job and said, "This course helped me get motivated and organized to take action. The content is clearly outlined which made it easy to follow and easy to understand. The examples throughout the course were very relevant and helped put my circumstances into perspective."
  • Chanchira Trirat recently completed this course and said, "I have done several courses on Udemy and this has been the most well structured and professionally put together course. It is very clear that Steve not only knows his subject matter but has a lot of personal experience on the topic which makes all the difference. His pre-interview preparation could mean the difference between getting the job or not. Vital for any job searcher.
  • And a few others have said, "Gave me great ideas to help pursue my career!" "Great advice about what to expect and how to transition in my career." "Very informative and useful...helps shift the job hunting mindset."

BONUS LESSONS & RESOURCES INCLUDE:
  • How to Survive Unemployment
  • Overcoming Underemployment
  • Advantages/Disadvantages of Contract Employment
  • You can also download all the audio files for this course to listen to while you're on the go.

FREE PREVIEWS

Click the Preview buttons in the course outline down below to see a free sample of the videos that will teach you how to get a better job faster.

MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE

There's a 30-day, no questions asked, money back guarantee for this course. If you're not satisfied, you get all your money back, it's that easy.

ENROLL NOW

Click the "Take This Course" button at the top-right of this page to start learning how to find a better job right away.
title: How to Get Hired Faster: Job Hunting Shortcuts & Hacks
